plugin.name: InfoMessageOnly
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlists 3
plugin.desc:
PLEASE READ: Dynamic Playlists 3 uses a different name now.
Please *uninstall* any *previous* version of Dynamic Playlists *3* FIRST.
Then install the new version of 'Dynamic Playlist 3' from the LMS main repository: LMS > Settings > Plugins.
And don't forget to delete this repository url from LMS > Settings > Plugins. Sorry for the inconvenience.
plugin.creator: AF
